attributes.action: update current plans to replace Royal Navy aircraft carriers, increasing total number to 3, and change the names to HMS Indefatigable, HMS Infallible and HMS Invincible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current plans to replace the ageing fleet of Invincible aircraft carriers will leave our armed forces unable to protect our shores whilst carrying out their duties abroad.  Using our current resourses our forces would be unable to leave thier postings to return home, or go off to and protect ground troops anywhere else in the world, are country is built on proud and powerful naval traditions however the new plans will leave us looking weak to any opposing country and open to any threats to are home security.  I urge you all to sign up and allow our boys (and girls too) to continue to protect us.
